title: At Least 10 Dead as Typhoon Mitag Slams into Korea
text:
At least 10 people were killed and eight injured when typhoon Mitag slammed into southern Korea on Wednesday night. Four others remain missing, while 481 people were left homeless.

According to the Central Disaster and Safety Countermeasures Headquarters on Thursday, Mitag hit the mainland near the southwestern port city of Mokpo and exited into the East Sea at around noon.

The typhoon brought 556 mm of rainfall in Uljin, North Gyeongsang Province, 489 mm on Ulleung Island and 371 mm in Gangneung, Gangwon Province.
description: At Least 10 Dead as Typhoon Mitag Slams into Korea
